archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: DEAD: Transaction Processing Service [TPS]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Transaction Processing Service (TPS) processes all transactions that occurred at the outlets or branch offices owned by Post Office Limited.
TPS provides the interface to various systems owned by Post Office Limited and others. It interfaces to the Branch Database to receive the transactions and transfers the details in various forms, including summaries and reports as flat files.
Being deprecated under Bexit
